project_descr: Preventing the extinction of terrestrial species by combating illegal wildlife trade (IWT) and reducing human-wildlife conflict (HWC) in Angola. - Project Preparation Grant

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the GEF PPG is to develop the project concept into a full project: “Combating Illegal Wildlife Trade and Human Wildlife Conflict in Angola”. As described in the project concept (PIF/child project concept note), this project aims to prevent the extinction of terrestrial species by combating illegal wildlife trade (IWT) and reducing human-wildlife conflict (HWC) in Angola.

project_title: combating illegal wildlife trade and human wildlife
